agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the agreement between the issuing or bonding company, and the Virginia Department of and Consumer Services relating to the surety protection of consumers. This series may include but is not limited to: bonds and letters of credit.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the receipt of consumer complaints, investigation, and actions taken. This series may include, but not limited to: complaints, interviews, and supporting documentation

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the obligations and activities of charitable and civic organizations, the Professional Counsel, and professional solicitors under the Virginia Solicitation of Contributions Law. This series may include, but not limited to: registration statements, finance reports, professional solicitor campaign materials, registration fee receipts, fund raising contracts, investigations, and correspondence
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the regulation of credit services businesses including annual registration, deficiencies, law enforcement, and settlements. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the regulation of extended-use service contracts including annual registration, deficiencies, law enforcement, and settlements. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the annual registration, deficiencies, settlements, and complaints concerning health clubs. This series may include, but not limited to: applications, correspondence, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Licensing Files: Charitable Organizations, Suppliers, and Manufacturers
series_description: This series documents the license applications of charitable organizations, gaming suppliers, and manufacturers, and the agency's actions in response. This series may include, but is limited to: applications, correspondence, and supporting documentation.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the regulation of membership campground contracts including annual registration, deficiencies, law enforcement, and settlements. This series include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, support documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Reports: Audit, Financial, Incident, Inspection, and
series_description: This series documents the routine inspection, audit, and investigation of licensees and incidents, and includes the submission of financial reports by licensees. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit, financial, incident, and investigation reports; findings, exhibits, recommendations, and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the regulation of travel club services including annual registration, deficiencies, law enforcement, settlements. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year
